creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
medium: Etching and aquatint, first state of two
text: This is the presentation proof given by Théophile-Alexandre Steinlen to his French publisher, Eugène Delâtre. Steinlen's gesture is indicated by the inscription, where he signed his name in pencil and wrote "à Eug. Delâtre."
title: Woman Bathing her Feet
